name: Endangered Species: Go-Kart Smash
description:
Get ready for the bumpiest ride of your life in this go-kart build-and-crash game based on the animated TV series Endangered Species!
Choose from a fleet of weird karts, then make them even weirder by equipping dozens of wacky parts! Candy for wheels? Check! A fishing rod on the bumper? Got it! A flamethrower for a hood ornament? Why not! When you’ve built the weirdest, coolest cart possible, go for a danger drive to test it out. Tumble through obstacles, bounce across hazards, and leap over (or into) danger! But watch out—your kart might wear down, or even explode! So drag and drop Pickle, Merl and Gull to operate, fix, or even stand in for the different parts. Will your cart smash to pieces in a hilarious explosion? Or will it survive, and unlock even more madness?
You decide—will you go for the finish line, or disaster on the track? Both come with their own rewards!

Features:

• A fleet of wacky karts to unlock and customize!
• Dozens of add-on parts to experiment with! The possibilities are endless…and ridiculous!
• Starring Pickle, Merl and Gull as your frantic mechanics—move them around your kart to keep it from falling apart!
• Three danger-filled tracks to test drive on!
• Control your kart’s speed, or send it flying through the air!
• Collect gears to repair your kart as you go!
• Collect golden bolts to trade in for even cooler karts and accessories!
